text: Zunui nii ɲadegai tɔgi letemazu, naa ɠa ɠizɔɔpe tufa ɓifɔgi gila seɠe, é dɔ ziɛi wu, é ta vaza seɠe ɠotai wu, ʋɛ nui ta zaai ná, ta aniɲakaiti ma, ta nuiti kpein ma ti ɠɛni ná. Toɠa kɛ ɠana nɔ naama nui ʋɛ, nii fɔɔɠuai nu ɠaeiti ba, ɓaa nu ʋoomai ʋa, nii nui ta paai, ɓaa saai ɓɔɠɔ ʋɛ, ɓaa nii fɔɔɠuai kabai ʋa.
